content.raw:
The approach implemented on pull request #618 builds dependencies from source, see for example how the `ign-common` `gz11` build is building cmake and math [from source](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/7/consoleFull#console-section-6). That's what the `export BUILD_IGN_**=true` lines are doing.

Instead, with the approach in this PR, ign-msgs will rely on debs for the dependencies, instead of building them from source. Which for now could be ok, I just wanted to point that we'll end up with inconsistent approaches for each library.
